ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 1193
ygData.msgSnippet: Ahhh the old head in your way when you cast trick.....you can do away with that if you have an enchanter in the group or if you have an illusion mask....if you
ygData.messageBody:
Ahhh the old head in your way when you cast trick.....you can do away
with that if you have an enchanter in the group or if you have an
illusion mask....if you have a horse ....cast your horse....then
either click your illusion mask or have an enchanter cast an illusion
on you....then after the illusion is on you....just click the
illusion off and your horses head will disappear from your
screen....its a neat little trick to be able to see a little better.--
- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Steven R. Hulse" <steveh@m...> wrote:
> LOL well I can agree with the "rich" part for sure! 10k plat for
one of
> them isn't cheap!
>
> I have one for my cleric as well and I found that (other than
medding
> and looking rich) they help when you are in an area with a lot of
hills
> (You don't get injured from falling) and if you are encumbered it
helps.
> They are fun to ride on but slow to start and slow to stop. It's
like
> its emulating you spuring it's side and saying "Giddyup!". Oh and
they
> eat like mad! So either become good a baking or buy cheap food (Or
> better yet summon if you can) and keep it in an unbagged slot so it
will
> be the first food to get eaten.
>
> As for the old debate of which is better, a Drog or a Horse, all I
will
> say is just keep this in mind, on a horse you constantly have
his/her
> head in your view and can make targeting a little difficult if you
are
> just manually clicking on your target. With a Drog you don't have
the
> head in your view, unless you are surrounded by a bunch of gnomes!
>
> :-) Durgaa
>
> EverQuest@yahoogroups.com wrote:
>
> Message: 2
> Date: Thu, 30 Jun 2005 18:39:08 -0000
> From: "mushuplus" <mushuplus@y...>
> Subject: Are slow horses worth getting?
>
> They look fun to ride on, but i don't think they are worth it
because
> on my friend's account he has a cheap drog and then i found out the
> cheap ones are slow =P lol. Are the horses the same? All the things
> the cheap ones do is make you look rich.
